ft_accountant.description_1: You can set expenses off against tax. [TAX-7%]
ft_accountant.description_2: You are good at setting expenses off against tax. [TAX-15%]
ft_accountant.display: Working as an accountant reduces your tax payment.

ft_attbcon.display: Pushing your head against a wall makes you tougher.

ft_attblck.description_2: You can rely on a good dose of luck.
ft_attblck.description_3: The goddess of luck smiles on you.
ft_attblck.display: Sighting a falling star brings you luck.

ft_attblife.description_1: You are an apprentice of an ascetic. [HP+5%]
ft_attblife.description_2: You are a journeyman of an ascetic. [HP+10%]
ft_attblife.description_3: You are an expert of an ascetic. [HP+15%]
ft_attblife.description_4: You are a master of an ascetic. [HP+20%]
ft_attblife.display: Being an ascetic increases your HP.

ft_attbmana.description_4: Your body is made of magic. [MP+20%]
ft_attbmana.display: You gain MP by using gene manipulation.

ft_attbspd.description_2: You can run faster than a cat. [SPD+10]

ft_attbstr.description_2: You are a good arm wrestler. [STR+6]
ft_attbstr.description_3: You are a master of arm wrestling. [STR+9]
ft_attbstr.display: Training arm wrestling increases your strength.

ft_breathfire.display: Too much drinking makes you want to breath fire.

ft_dimensionmove.description_1: You can insta-teleport to nearby tiles.
ft_dimensionmove.display: You hit upon an idea of insta-teleport from a dream.

ft_dv.description_1: You can somewhat dodge enemy attacks. [DV+4]
ft_dv.description_3: You can really dodge enemy attacks. [DV+12]
ft_dv.display: You learn how to dodge attacks.

ft_exorcist.display: Your prayer weakens the power of cursed whisperings.

ft_gentleface.description_1: Your attacks don't cause enemies to run.
ft_gentleface.display: Your gentle face prevents your enemies from escaping.

ft_leader.description_1: You can temporally strengthen your allies.
ft_leader.display: You find how to strengthen your allies for a short time.

ft_pv.description_1: Your defense is as hard as stone. [PV+5]
ft_pv.description_2: Your defense is as hard as iron. [PV+10]
ft_pv.description_3: Your defense is as hard as steel. [PV+15]
ft_pv.display: You establish your own defensive style.

ft_quartermaster.display: Working as a quartermaster gives you better payoff.

ft_resistdark.description_2: You can dance in darkness. [RES Darkness++]
ft_resistdark.display: Living in darkness makes you resistant to darkness.

ft_resistpoison.description_1: You have a torerance to poison. [RES Poison+]
ft_resistpoison.description_2: You have a strong tolerance to poison. [RES Poison++]
ft_resistpoison.display: Being a taster for a noble grants you resistance to poison.

ft_shieldbash.description_1: You can bash with your shield more frequently.
ft_shieldbash.display: Mastering shield increases your chance of shield bash.

ft_skillcasting.display: Daily meditation increases your casting skill.

ft_skilldetection.description_2: You are very cautious about traps. [Detection+6]
ft_skilldetection.display: You search around carefully to spot traps.

ft_skilldualwield.description_1: You can handle multiple weapons. [Dual Wield+4]
ft_skilldualwield.description_2: You mastered multiple weapon style. [Two Wield+8]
ft_skilldualwield.display: Years of training increases your two weapon fighting skill.

ft_skillfaith.display: Training under a priest deepens your faith.

ft_skillmartial.display: You learn tricks of martial arts from fighting in streets.

ft_skillnegotiation.display: Working under a trader improves your negotiation skill.

ft_stamina.display: Years of training strengthens your stamina.

ft_touchdrain.display: Your vampire friend teaches you how to suck blood.

ft_touchpoison.display: Researching poisons leads you to a method to poison others.

ft_touchsleep.display: Suddenly, you know how to make everyone sleep.

mut_cannibalism.description_1: You have no trouble eating human flesh.
mut_cannibalism.gain: You are charmed by the flavor of human flesh.
mut_cannibalism.lose: You can no longer accept human flesh.

mut_eyes.description_1: You have the eyes of a cat. [PER+5]
mut_eyes.description_2: You have the eyes of a hawk. [PER+10]
mut_eyes.description_-2: You are blind in one eye. [PER-10]

mut_ironskin.description_3: Your skin is as hard as iron. [PV+9]

mut_joint.description_-2: You are worrying about your joint creakings. [DEX-6]

mut_resistcold.description_1: Your skin is covered by frost.[RES Cold+]

mut_resistlightning.description_1: You have resistance to lightning.[RES Lightning+]
mut_resistlightning.description_-1: You have weakness to lightning.[RES Lightning-]

mut_resistmagic.description_1: You have resistance to magic.[RES Magic+]
mut_resistmagic.description_-1: You have weakness to magic.[RES Magic-]

mut_trollblood.description_-2: You constantly have an attack of anemia. [Regeneration--]

mut_voice.description_-2: Everyone is frightened when you talk.[CHR-10]

race_fairyweak.description_1: You can't wear equipment weight more than 1s. [DV++]

race_godluck.description_1: Quality stuff are generated around you.

race_godprotect.description_1: You are given physical damage reduction.

race_godsanity.description_1: You are surrounded by an aura that cures sanity.

race_godspells.description_1: Elemental spells you cast are empowered.

race_good.description_1: You are a good man. [Karma limit +20]

race_magcapacity.description_1: You take less damage from mana reactions.

race_mutate.description_1: Your body is changing every moment.

race_resistcold.description_2: You have strong resistance to cold.
race_resistcold.description_-2: You have strong weakness to cold.

race_resistdark.description_2: You have strong resistance to darkness.
race_resistdark.description_-2: You have strong weakness to darkness.

race_resistfire.description_2: You have strong resistance to fire.
race_resistfire.description_-2: You have strong weakness to fire.

race_resistmagic.description_2: You have strong resistance to magic.
race_resistmagic.description_-2: You have strong weakness to magic.

race_resistpoison.description_2: You have strong resistance to poison.
race_resistpoison.description_-2: You have strong weakness to poison.

race_slowether.description_1: Your body slows the Ether Disease progress.
